channel.title: Adding your own Player Owned House
channel.description: How would I add so every registered Player gets there own Player Owned house to work on?

item.title: Adding your own Player Owned House
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Superman05 said you can do it by updating the region.
its complicated, but not impossible

Read full topic
item.source: Adding your own Player Owned House

item.title: Adding your own Player Owned House
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s pretty complicated and may be impossible in lower revisions (I’m not sure if they have the proper methods to generate maps server side and the client accept them)

But depending on your playebase size, you could probably write a system to sell the actual houses in RS, prices based on how many tiles in space they are.

Read full topic
